title: julerz12
author: julerz12
created_time: December 11, 2022, 12:28:27 AMLast edit: June 22, 2023, 03:45:29 PM by julerz12
content: Moonbet.io content creation campaign has officially ended.The spreadsheet will now be finalized and rewards will be sent 1 to 2 weeks after we have the Final list.Signatures can now be removed/changedMoonbet Spreadsheet stakes has been added. Check your details on the spreadsheet and see if everything is in order (Wallet address, stakes, etc.), you have 48 hours to do so.The final list for the rewards distribution will be created after 48 hours.[EDIT]1/16/2023Moonbet.io Final List created.Ready on my end to distribute the rewards, just waiting for the Moonbet team to send BNB for the gas/transaction fee.[EDIT]1/17/2023Moonbet.io Content Creation Campaign Rewards have been distributed: https://bscscan.com/tx/0xf7aa337c76c3fc9139141616e61af4b64e9e21367e433e13a7987d44f274a53f.....[ WEBSITE ]....[ TWITTER ]....[ FACEBOOK ]....[ INSTAGRAM ]....[ TELEGRAM ]....[ REDDIT ]....[ MEDIUM ]....[ YOUTUBE ].....Disclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on this bounty campaign)or Invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO) at your own risk.
